description: This file defines a login page component for the Foodly web application using the Qwik framework. It handles user input for email and password, manages login state, and navigates upon successful login.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Creates a reactive component for the login page.

methods.name: useSignal
methods.description: Creates reactive signals for managing form state and login status.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Runs side effects when the component's visibility state changes, used here to check if user is already logged in.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs login logic, and redirects on success.
